item.title: Climate change: IPCC report is 'code red for humanity'
item.description: Heating from humans has caused irreparable damage to the Earth that may get worse in coming decades.

item.title: Afghanistan war: At least 27 children killed in three days, UN says
item.description: Unicef says 27 deaths were recorded in three regions over 72 hours, amid rising violence.

item.title: Greece wildfires: Evia island residents forced to evacuate
item.description: Hundreds on the island of Evia flee to safety by sea as a record heatwave sparks devastating fires.

item.title: Shishov case: Belarus leader Lukashenko denies link to dissident's death
item.description: Alexander Lukashenko insists he had nothing to do with a suspicious hanging in Ukraine last week.

item.title: Andrew Cuomo: Accuser Brittany Commisso says governor broke law
item.description: Brittany Commisso speaks for the first time about alleged groping incidents with New York governor.

item.title: Suspect in Nantes cathedral fire held over French priest's killing
item.description: French police also suspect the Rwandan man of starting a fire that ravaged Nantes cathedral in 2020.

item.title: Thunberg calls out climate impact of fashion brands in Vogue interview
item.description: Many companies are only pretending to care about the climate, the activist tells Vogue Scandinavia.

item.title: Alibaba to sack manager accused of rape, according to memo seen by BBC
item.description: The move comes after a woman's allegations of sexual assault went viral on Chinese social media.

item.title: Dixie Fire: Firefighters tackle historic California wildfire
item.description: The Dixie Fire has burned through more than 489,000 acres and could take weeks to extinguish.

item.title: Nigerian Igbo Jewish leader arrested with Israeli visitors freed
item.description: Lizben Agha was held for weeks without charge after becoming caught up with the three men's arrest.

item.title: We For India: Stars unite to help Covid relief work in India
item.description: Ed Sheeran, Annie Lennox, Mick Jagger and Bollywood actors will join forces for livestreamed event.

item.title: 'Smallest baby at birth' home after 13 months in hospital
item.description: Kwek Yu Xuan weighed only 212g - the weight of an apple - when she was born in Singapore last year.

item.title: Quan Hongchan: Chinese teen diving star's village mobbed by fans
item.description: Quan Hongchan's village has been sealed off after being mobbed by people searching for selfies.

item.title: Climate change: Five things we have learned from the IPCC report
item.description: What are the key takeaways from the IPCC new study on the science of climate change?

item.title: Why China's climate policy matters to us all
item.description: The global battle against climate change is likely to be won or lost in China.

item.title: Malta: The teenagers pulled from the sea and accused of terrorism
item.description: How three teenagers rescued from the Mediterranean Sea ended up in Malta accused of terrorism.

item.title: Assam-Mizoram clash: 'It was like a war between two countries'
item.description: A long-running border dispute is affecting relations between two neighbouring Indian states.

item.title: Children's home fire: 'The souls of our daughters are still there'
item.description: The mothers of teenage girls who died in a 2017 fire at a children's home in Guatemala want justice.

item.title: Covid in Sydney: Communities feel under siege as troops deployed
item.description: Residents say they're being treated like second-class citizens to stem a Covid outbreak.

item.title: Greece wildfires: 'It's like a horror movie but it's real life'
item.description: Thousands of people have had to evacuate Greece's second biggest island as severe wildfires rage.

item.title: Lionel Messi: Barcelona star in tears as he receives ovation news conference
item.description: Lionel Messi is distraught as he receives a standing ovation from team-mates, journalists, officials and his family at a news conference confirming his departure from Barcelona.

item.title: North Korea floods: Homes destroyed and thousands evacuated
item.description: The state broadcaster says some regions have seen over 50cm (20in) of rain in three days.

item.title: Tokyo Olympics: Capturing the perfect moment
item.description: Three sports photographers explain what goes into getting the best shots of the day at the Games.

item.title: Greece fires: Hundreds rescued by coastguard
item.description: The coastguard moved 650 people from Limni, in the north of the island of Evia.
